markdownRemark.html: A water sport that the whole family can enjoy. SUP is fun activity you can practice at various locations along the Costa del Sol.

frontmatter.title: La Mar de Bien (The world of good surf club) - Stand Up Paddle
frontmatter.description: La Mar de Bien (The world of good surf club) - Stand Up Paddle - A water sport that the whole family can enjoy. SUP is fun activity you can practice at various locations along the Costa del Sol.
frontmatter.address: Paseo Marítimo Sunset Beach Club, s/n, 29630 Benalmádena Costa, Málaga
frontmatter.price: Rental – 15.00 euros for 1 hour / Lessons – 28.00 euros for 2 hours
